snippet: Auston Matthews, who is expected to be the No. 1 pick in the N.H.L. draft, had a goal and an assist to lead the United States to a 4-1 victory over Denmark in the world junior hockey championship in Helsinki, Finland.
abstract: United States advances in world junior hockey championship after 4-1 victory over Denmark; other match results from event noted.
lead_paragraph: Auston Matthews, who is expected to be the No. 1 pick in the N.H.L. draft, had a goal and an assist to lead the United States to a 4-1 victory over Denmark in the world junior hockey championship in Helsinki, Finland.

headline.main: U.S. Tops Denmark at World Juniors
headline.print_headline: U.S. Tops Denmark at World Juniors
